achievements.name: Eck's Gon' Give It to Ya
Who's the Underdog?
achievements.description: Won a multiplayer match with three 'Mechs vs. an OpFor with four 'Mechs

achievements.name: Clash Winner
achievements.description: Won a skirmish match at the Clash (15m) Lance Value Budget

achievements.name: Battle Winner
achievements.description: Won a skirmish match at the Battle (20m) Lance Value Budget

achievements.name: War Winner
achievements.description: Won a skirmish match at the War (25m) Lance Value Budget

achievements.name: Unlimited Winner
achievements.description: Won a skirmish match with more than 25m Lance Value on both sides

achievements.name: Who's Unbalanced?
achievements.description: Won a skirmish match using fewer 'Mechs than the AI opponent

achievements.name: Making the Most of What You've Got
achievements.description: Won a skirmish match with a Lance Value 5m less than the OpFor's

achievements.name: Undaunted
achievements.description: Won a skirmish match with a Lance Value 10m less than the OpFor's

achievements.name: Fortune Favors the Bold
achievements.description: Won a skirmish match with a Lance Value 15m less than the OpFor's

achievements.name: Plague of Locusts
achievements.description: Won a 4v4 match with all of your 'Mechs being Locusts

achievements.name: Learn from Your Mistakes
achievements.description: Lost to the AI one time

achievements.name: Training Is the Path to Victory
Surgical Extraction
achievements.description: Killed a Pilot without destroying their 'Mech

achievements.name: Alpha Striker
achievements.description: Destroyed an enemy 'Mech with an Alpha Strike

achievements.name: One Shot
achievements.description: Destroyed an enemy 'Mech's head with a Called Shot

achievements.name: Kneecapper
achievements.description: Destroyed an enemy 'Mech's leg with a Called Shot

achievements.name: Look Out Below
achievements.description: Destroyed 5 enemy 'Mechs with Death from Above

achievements.name: On Wings of Flame
achievements.description: Destroyed 20 enemy 'Mechs with Death from Above

achievements.name: Kick 'Em When They're Down
achievements.description: Made a melee attack on an enemy 'Mech that was knocked prone

achievements.name: Double Kill
achievements.description: Destroyed two 'Mechs in the same turn

achievements.name: Pick On Someone Your Own Size
No Guts, No Galaxy
achievements.description: Maxed out a MechWarrior's Guts stat

achievements.name: Master Tactician
achievements.description: Maxed out a MechWarrior's Tactics stat

achievements.name: Danger Zone
achievements.description: Maxed out a MechWarrior's Piloting stat

achievements.name: Deadeye
achievements.description: Maxed out a MechWarrior's Gunnery stat

achievements.name: Gimme the Goods
achievements.description: Negotiated for nothing but salvage in a completed contract

achievements.name: Of Noble Heart
achievements.description: Negotiated for nothing but reputation in a completed contract

achievements.name: A Mercenary's Work Is Never Done
In Over Your Head
achievements.description: Retreated once from a contract before any of your 'Mechs got destroyed

achievements.name: Bullet Farmer
achievements.description: Refitted a 'Mech with only Ballistic weapons

achievements.name: Laser Show
achievements.description: Refitted a 'Mech with only Energy weapons

achievements.name: Raining Fire
achievements.description: Refitted a 'Mech with only Missile weapons

achievements.name: Punchmaster 6000
achievements.description: Refitted a 'Mech with only Support weapons

achievements.name: Totally Awesome
achievements.description: Refitted a 'Mech other than an Awesome equipped with three or more PPCs

achievements.name: Tank Up
achievements.description: Refitted a 'Mech with the maximum amount of armor

achievements.name: I Am Iron Man!
achievements.description: Completed a Campaign with Iron Man enabled

achievements.name: Professional Scavenger
achievements.description: Start a campaign with 'Mechs requiring 8 parts, then complete 10 'Mechs

achievements.name: Hail to the Queens
achievements.description: Become Allied with the Magistracy of Canopus

achievements.name: Loyal to the Periphery
achievements.description: Become Allied with the Taurian Concordat

achievements.name: Still Alive
achievements.description: Completed a contract with one mech remaining and no pilots killed

achievements.name: Survived A Mercenary Career
achievements.description: Completed your first Career Mode campaign with any rank

achievements.name: A Veteran Mercenary
achievements.description: Accomplished a Career Mode score at Veteran rank

achievements.name: An Elite Mercenary
achievements.description: Accomplished a Career Mode score at Elite rank

achievements.name: A Legendary Mercenary
achievements.description: Accomplished a Career Mode score at Legendary rank

achievements.name: Heart of Iron
achievements.description: Completed Career Mode with Iron Man enabled

achievements.name: A Career Unheard of in Over Two Centuries
